actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 31 of title 10, United States Code, to prohibit the requirement for furnishing certain information as a condition to enlisting in the armed forces.

summary.text: Stipulates that no individual, as a condition for enlisting in the armed forces, shall be required to furnish any information relating to an offense for which such individual was arrested, charged, or convicted if such charge has been dismissed or the record of such arrest, charge or conviction has been sealed or expunged. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 502)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 31 of title 10, United States Code, to prohibit the requirement for furnishing certain information as a condition to enlisting in the armed forces.
